title: Emerald & Diamond Grandeur: The Mohana Haaram
features: This magnificent Mohana Haaram features a stunning cascade design, expertly crafted with the traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting technique. Rectangular cut emeralds are interspersed with diamond-studded floral motifs, creating a regal and timeless look. The bottom tier features larger pear-shaped emeralds bordered by intricate diamond settings, adding depth and dimension. The necklace showcases a layered design of multiple intricate patterns of white diamonds to give it a lavish look.
occasions: and special cultural events. A statement piece that adds unmatched elegance to any celebratory ensemble.
description: A true heirloom piece, the Mohana Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with modern sophistication. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi Kundan craftsmanship exemplifies the region's rich jewelry-making heritage. Its grandeur makes it ideal for the bride that will be remembered for years to come.
